plot: After an aerosol device infects Sean McCarthy with a deadly virus, he drifts between memories of his girlfriend and the horrifying reality of his life.
title: Patient Zero
plot_es: After an aerosol device infects Sean McCarthy with a deadly virus, he drifts between memories of his girlfriend and the horrifying reality of his life.
plot_en: After an aerosol device infects Sean McCarthy with a deadly virus, he drifts between memories of his girlfriend and the horrifying reality of his life.
